name: Wizards of Odd
overview: 3-player puzzle/platform action. Does anyone remember a game called 'The Teller' ? No? Well, it was something like this: There were 3 strange wizards, they were each shown a 5x5 pattern in their own 'base'. This pattern then disappears and its a mad rush to re-make their pattern with blocks flying around the screen. Once a player completes the pattern the correct blocks the players got were totaled up and added to there score.
